bibl.title: Evolution and Revolution in Nubian Pottery.
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: The Meroitic revolution. - The Ballana revolution. - The classic christian revolution. - The terminal christian revolution. - Some afterthoughts. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: William Y. Adams, Evolution and Revolution in Nubian Pottery.
A. Łajtar, A. Obłuski & I. Zych (edd.), Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 315-328, 5 figg.
